name: crofter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who lives and works on a croft (= a very small farm, especially in Scotland): He is the son of a Scottish crofter. The activities of farmers and crofters are vital to the wellbeing of the countryside. See
croft
More examplesFewer examplesThey live in a converted crofter's cottage.Thousands of crofters were evicted from their homes in order to make room for profitable sheep-farming.
